text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunshine glow
Feeling light the world on show
In a field where flowers grow
Sunflowers sway to say hello

[Verse 2]
Golden petals touch the sky
As we dance just you and I
Chasing dreams that never die
Underneath this bright blue sky

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh sunflower dreams
Catch the light in brilliant beams
Oh oh oh life it seems
Is brighter with sunflower dreams

[Verse 3]
Endless sea of yellow hues
With every step we feel the blues
Fade away like morning dew
Our hearts in sync we always knew

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh sunflower dreams
Catch the light in brilliant beams
Oh oh oh life it seems
Is brighter with sunflower dreams

[Bridge]
Hand in hand we wander far
In this field where sunflowers are
Every moment like a star
Shooting bright in dreams afar
title: Sunflower Dreams
